summary:
## Gunfight at the O.K. Corral

The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral happened in Tombstone, Arizona, in 1881. It was a quick shootout between lawmen, including the famous Wyatt Earp, and a group of outlaws called the Cowboys. The fight started because the lawmen wanted to enforce a rule against carrying weapons in town. Three Cowboys were killed, but no lawmen were.

This fight became super famous thanks to books and movies, even though it only lasted a minute. It's a classic story of the American Old West, even though it didn't actually happen at the O.K. Corral!
title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
